Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the IAD erred in finding the marriage not genuine and primarily for status acquisition
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's testimony found credible, but insufficient to overcome other findings
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Subsection 4(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine and entered primarily to acquire Canadian status
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Financial dependence and lack of effort to support self in home country
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Appeal before IAD, followed by judicial review
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Subsection 4(1), Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged error in assessing genuineness of marriage
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Concerns about marriage genuineness and intent to circumvent immigration rules
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Weight given to financial and behavioral evidence over testimony
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Limited credibility concerns; focus on objective indicators
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of IAD’s interpretation
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standard of review in administrative appeals

Crimes.Crime_Name: Marriage Fraud under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the IAD erred in finding the marriage not genuine and primarily for status acquisition
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Testimony considered credible but outweighed by contextual factors
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Subsection 4(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage entered into primarily to obtain immigration status
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Applicant’s husband’s refugee claim failure and healthcare-related motivations
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Appeal before IAD, followed by judicial review
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Subsection 4(1), Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged error in weighing intent versus relationship evidence
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Suspicion of marriage fraud to gain permanent residency
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Emphasis on pre-marriage behavior and financial reliance
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Minor credibility doubts based on timing and circumstances
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of IAD’s factual inference
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standard of review in administrative appeals
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Marriage not genuine, entered for immigration advantage
